alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Pulaski; Wayne; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:50AM EDT until April 01 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wayne County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... McCreary County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Whitley County in south central Kentucky... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 249 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hidalgo, or 8 miles southwest of Monticello, moving east at 85 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Oil Valley around 255 AM EDT. Gregory around 300 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Greenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for south central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EDT for south central Kentucky.
